content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 15)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (10, 15)
- Boiler at position (11, 15)
- Offshore Pump at position (9, 15)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (20, 25)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (20, 25) and a Furnace at position (21, 25)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (22, 25) and a Furnace at position (23, 25)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (24, 25) and a Furnace at position (25, 25)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (30, 35) and a Furnace at position (31, 35)
- Assembling Machine at position (32, 35) and Inserter at position (33, 35) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Belt group connecting the Furnace at position (31, 35) to the Assembling Machine at position (32, 35)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Incorrect API Usage
- Double-check the API documentation to ensure correct usage of functions and parameters.

### Errors in Misalignment of Conveyor Belts
- Verify the alignment and direction of conveyor belts to ensure items are transported correctly.

### Errors in Power Connectivity
- Ensure all machines requiring power are connected to a power source and check for any breaks in the power network.

### Errors in Inserter Placement
- Ensure inserters are correctly positioned to pick up and place items between machines or belts.
